column4: hi,all! does anybody know why I couldn't see any partitions during installation? (8.04, chipset:EP43, HD:Seagate 320G SATA )
seems many people have the same issue with P43 chipset
# Use a live cd..At start or install press F6 add all_generic_ide before the "--"
after I enable the AHCP in bios, the installation success.
